mapper.update: merge into game_score_stats s using ( select game_no, count(*) as review_count, sum(review_score) as total_score from member_review where game_no = #{gameNo} and review_status = 'active' group by game_no ) r on (s.game_no = r.game_no) when matched then update set s.total_score = r.total_score, s.review_count = r.review_count when not matched then insert (game_no, total_score, review_count) values (r.game_no, r.total_score, r.review_count)
